definition: to refrain/to give up evil (temporarily)/to cover one's traces/to lie low/to retire (from view)
to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]

sentences.english: The shapes of the past dissolved and the future was free of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 往昔已斂跡循形，未來沒有云霧籠罩。
